snippet.title: Perspectrum Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Players take the role of the Tall Stranger, a being who has awakened with the power to use ancient fountains to change the elements of the world. The stranger must use spirit fragments scattered throughout the various levels to bring the mountain back to life.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/890630/Perspectrum/
Itch.io: https://vandaliasoftworks.itch.io/perspectrum
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/perspectrum/351458

More Details: http://www.perspectrumgame.com/2018/07/30/vandalia-softworks-and-proudmom-games-announce-launch-details-for-perspectrum/
Press Kit:  https://www.indiedb.com/games/perspectrum/presskit/all
